data.eml:eml: Two new feather mite species of the family Pteronyssidae (Acarina: Analgoidea) from Meghalaya (Northeast India)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantinescu, Ioana Cristina, Chişamera, Gabriel, Mukhim, Khlur B., Adam, Costică (2014): Two new feather mite species of the family Pteronyssidae (Acarina: Analgoidea) from Meghalaya (Northeast India). Zootaxa 3774 (4): 351-366, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.4.4
